website_summaries.verdict: At an affordable price, this volumizing mascara provides a natural look and is easy to apply.
pros: Has an impressive brush that makes it easy to apply mascara without clumping, even if applying several coats
Comes off easily at the end of the day with water
Dries on lashes quickly and flake-free
cons: May smudge if exposed to moisture

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed once buying it from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for a long time in black/brown. Since ordering it from Amazon my opinion has dominated. It seems dried out (I learned a hack to set it in a hot cup of water to get it to ‘move’ at all) and clumps horribly for ‘clump crushing’ product. Searching for new product. Must just need to purchase only from a store to get the ‘freshest’ tubes.
customer_reviews.author: JNM

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it No Stars I would. I purposely bought this for the Water Resistance factor. First day I used it, it went on nice and easy and lasted all day, except that after my workout I got home and had mascara all under my eyes (water resistant, I think not) I proceeded to rinse off in the shower, not wetting my hair and when I got out I now had mascara running all down my face? I had no problem removing the mascara, because most of it had already come off. If you're looking for Water Resistant mascara, THIS ISN"T IT!!! VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Webber

customer_reviews.title: and the yellow one makes me look like I have spider legs on my eyes because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have long lashes, and find that the orange one is overly dramatic, and the yellow one makes me look like I have spider legs on my eyes because it makes them so long. So if you have short lashes, go for the yellow. If you have an event, go for the orange. I don't wear makeup daily, and find that this green one is perfect for my lashes if I'm doing a more neutral look and just want my eyes to pop.
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: No clumps, easy to apply, makes my short lashes look better but seems to dry out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the regular clump crusher for many years and liked it a lot. I initially thought this was just as good and maybe better if you were looking for more length. At first there were few to no clumps and definitely made my lashes appear longer. It was easy to apply quickly without having to fiddle/fix clumps. It won’t give you the look of false eyelashes if that’s what you want but definitely longer. Unfortunately after a month the mascara seems to be drying out is starting to look more clumpy. For reference, I have sparse, short, straight lashes. This made a nice difference for me without looking too fake until it started to get too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Girl

customer_reviews.title: It’s good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than the Marc Jacobs sample that I got from Sephora, I feel like that says a lot haha but that’s just me. This didn’t run down to my bottom eyelid or get on my upper eyelid like most mascara does and it separates my lashes well. I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Several positive, but it flakes, so nope
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. I'm not a huge fan of the curved plastic brush tip as far as ease of use, but it does seem to pick up the lashes on the inner and outer edges pretty well. As a positive, I'm allergic to several brands of mascara and did not have an issue with this brand, so it's good for sensitive skin/eyes. But I'm only giving it 3 stars because it flakes. If you touch your lashes at all, you'll have black flakes in your eyes. :( I won't toss it, but I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: etmama

customer_reviews.title: No clumps. Mystery color.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I've found. The description on Amazon didn't give any color information so I took a chance ordering it with the hopes that it would arrive somewhere between brown/black and some shade of black (hoping that I wouldn't get something weird like blue). The mascara came in brown/black which was acceptable. As the name says I never have gloppy or clumpy results. Also, I have sensitive eyes and This mascara doesn't flake into my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Moots

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara but last shipment looks like old stock
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara and have purchased variations of it many times. Doesn’t clump, doesn’t require lots of careful, slow application. Taking off one star since I’m concerned about how old the product is that came with the last shipment. All past packaging was bright green, like the package on the left (the one on the left is a slightly different version of the same product but I know the identical product was in the same green package). The black package on the right is what I received with my last shipment. It looks like old packaging and was slightly beaten up. Might be ok but I’m suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Oakland Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about what kind of mascara I use. My eyes are my best feature. I have used this mascara for several years now. I am constantly having people ask me who does my lashes like they’re fake or something. I tell them they are my eyelashes I do them myself with this product. I love the water resistant because it doesn’t smear if it starts to dry out in the tube I add just a touch of water in stir it very well with the brush in the tube and it makes my lashes look even longer.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail daily mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my holy grail daily mascara, which just so happens to be drugstore! It is fantastic. It stays on all day, does not clump or flake off. It layers quite well. Does not irritate my eyes whatsoever. I can't say that it is really waterproof, though, but it is much more 'waterproof' than regular mascaras. Perfect for daily wear - it is definitely more volume than length, but it does a great overall job. I continue to repurchase this over and over.
customer_reviews.author: einstein1990

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolutely perfect mascara for me. My lashes are long and so many other brands would always rub off on my upper eyelid during the day. The others I also had to work a second job to get off of my skin at night time. This one is smudge proof (idk about water proof) and easy to remove with water in the shower (no black circles!).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca-TX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lower lashes...
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara a lot. It separates my lashes and gives them a pretty natural look. It doesn't clump and the brush is great for getting every tiny lash. It's perfect for lower lashes. When I want a more dramatic look I simply layer with a second mascara . It's a beautiful day to day mascara and it stays in place and does not smudge. I shared this mascara with my mother 71yrs and my niece 26yrs and they both love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The best drugstore mascara. No clumps or smudging!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried about a dozen drugstore mascaras and this is my absolute favorite. The reasons why: * The curved brush - it is easy to apply and curls my lashes without my having to use an eyelash curler. * It stays put - no flaking off and no smudges, even after watching a sappy movie. * It is definitely waterproof - the only way I can remove it is with an oil-based remover. * It really doesn’t clump on my lashes! * You can’t beat the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Sloths&Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the non waterproof version I bought at the grocery store and liked it ... But I don't know if it was old, sitting in the warehouse or because I got the waterproof version but this was DRIED OUT ! I put water in it twice, didn't help. It was thin, barely made a difference. I'll never order another mascara online.
customer_reviews.author: C H

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely my favorite mascara, and I have tried some formulas far more expensive than this one. Ugly packaging, but amazing effects. No clumps, just long, dark, lush lashes. The wand takes a little getting used to, but once you’ve got it, the results are impressive. Turn the wand one way to coat the lashes root to tip, then use it the other way to extend the ends out. Favorite mascara ever!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This comes off easily with a bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: I'm not into makeup and have only tried at most 5 mascaras (elf to fancy ones from Saphora, and Covergirl waterproof). This is the only one that works for me. The waterproof does not work because I have oily skin that transfers the mascara to my skin making racoon eyes. This comes off easily with a bar of soap, normal face wash or even just water. It doesn't flake, it does transfer very minimally at the 12th or 16th hour. It makes the roots of my eyelash itch every so often but not every day that I wear it, and it's not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: IT-labs

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Extra Expense.
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other waterproof brands, I always come back to this mascara. I moved to The Netherlands and can't find it here, so I have to order through Amazon. The purchase price is fine, but the shipping and customs fees nearly double the cost, (not Amazon's fault). My eyes tend to water easily when outdoors, and I have often come home to find that I have raccoon eyes from my mascara. This has been the only waterproof mascara that doesn't smudge and end up making me look unintentionally Goth, ( which is not always a good look for a 66-year-old).
customer_reviews.author: Anja deRuiter

customer_reviews.title: Lookin' Good
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural blonde and need brown or brown black mascara. I live in the South and need waterproof or, at least, water resistant. I was using a Cover Girl (the one that Queen Latifa hawked) that I loved and they discontinued it. Sigh. After supplying half the county with mascara with purchases I did not like, I found this one. Goes on smooth and NO clumps. It is water resistant, stays on nicely, and is easy to remove. I am happy .... till they discontinue this one!
customer_reviews.author: GayleAnn

customer_reviews.title: Makes your lashes look worse than without anything at all!
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage, worst mascara I've ever used actually made my lashes look shorter with this joke of a mascara than without! Ruined my eyelashes after using a couple of tubes of this garbage and they're thinner than they've ever been. Need to use 5 coats to even get any sort of coverage and tubes are dried out like they've been sitting for 40 years on a shelf in the Mojave. I think they seriously only put like a dime sized drop of product in the whole tube. Totally a waste of money and time applying it. Can't believe I kept buying this trash...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t wear mascara for years because I needed three things - 1) Something that wouldn’t clump and 2) brown and 3) waterproof. Good luck. But this is perfect! It even leaves lashes in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: M-Montour

customer_reviews.title: Finally NO CLUMPS!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this mascara for quite awhile now. Finally a no clumping mascara that delivers! I have naturally long lashes but this amplified them more. I’m not good at replacing my mascara every 3 months as recommended but I kept track the past 6 months and when this does start to clump I get a new one. It seems to average about 3 months. I use this generally 5-6 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Only mascara I use
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is the only one I use. It really goes on smooth without clumps even if you use a lash primer below. I have seasonal allergies and my eyes can water during high pollen times. This does not come off during daily wear (it probably would if you cried a lot), but it is easily removable at night with makeup remover. I've found that some waterproof mascaras bond to lashes and it's difficult to remove. Not an issue with this one since it's only water resistant. Doesn't dry out easily and brush shape is perfect with the curve. Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll stick to buying mascara from the store
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I believe what I received may be old and/or dried out. It is extremely thick and pasty on the "brush". Said brush is a joke as well. It just seems so tiny and barely applied any mascara (although I suspect the mascara itself was at play here as well). Last but not least, the waterproof variety was what was advertised. What I received was not waterproof. The only redeeming quality was the "freebie" eyeliner. This was my first and last time deciding to purchase mascara online.
customer_reviews.author: Sinister SerenadeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Just an Ordinary Woman With Visible Lashes Thanks To This Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara very much! I got the green tube and have been using it for a few months now. My lashes are thin and light and I wear mascara daily because quite frankly, I look weird without eyelashes. This mascara is easy to apply and not clumpy. I can apply a two coats on my lashes and the result is good coverage and my confident stare. When I wash my face at night the product washes off easily WHICH I LOVE. I don't need to use an oily remover to get this stuff off. Typically I purchase mascara with no brand loyalty or favorite but I will purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: dessaysso

customer_reviews.title: it does great. Lashes are separated and look naturally longer
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a non waterproof mascara, it does great. Lashes are separated and look naturally longer. Color is true. It washes off easily if you cry or get your face wet but if you plan on doing that, I don't know why you wouldn't wear waterproof anyway. I don't wear makeup but do wear just mascara and this on is my favorite mascara. I put a coat of this on and then a coat of the water proof lash blast from covergirl and it's the perfect combo for a natural lasting look, for a hot/humid day working on the farm and running errands in town.
customer_reviews.author: MotherHen

customer_reviews.title: Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: I used this mascara for years and then switched to another brand which gave me thicker lashes while still looking natural. I preferred that look, but recently learned that the other brand is not actually cruelty free, so I switched back to this one. My lashes tend to be a little spikier than I prefer with this, but it's still a nice mascara for everyday wear. Not too dramatic, but you can layer it to get a fuller look if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Good Staple, Needs a Primer
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to mascara for several years. It gives a medium thickness coat but doesn’t clump. The curved wand makes it easier to separate your lashes. The waterproof is good but not amazing. For the price point, it does the trick. I recommend using a lash primer to prevent flaking. Before I started using a lash primer, this mascara would “fall” before the end of the day. I like this mascara for travel, gym bag, etc. because it gives good results but is cheap to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Should've listen to the reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to like this - decent price and brand reputation but...couldn't bring myself to doing it. It's a hit or miss with a lot of products (kinda like walking in the dark and stubbing your toe) - you take a chance. I'm usually very lucky...i don't buy anything that doesn't offer free returns. The reviews were spot on. I have disposable mascara wands so the issues with wands is not an issue. The mascara came out flakey. It dried and flaked within a minute. I had mascara confetti not only around my eyes but on my cheeks! I would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy feet

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Didn’t even get one use out of it..Mascara was so dried up! Like how old is this product...must of been on the shelf for years?!. Thank goodness it wasn’t expensive...i cant be bothered returning it. The seller should just send me a new tube! Couldn’t find a contact email?
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: My go to mascara for 7 years
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the first mascaras I used when I was in middle school. I have tried other mascaras (some luxury brands), and this one is still my favorite. The price point is great for the results. If you are looking for a mascara that eliminates clumps and lengthens, this is the one for you. It has a natural look, but you can build it up to a fuller looking lash. I can't emphasize enough how much I love this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rundgren

customer_reviews.title: My go to macara
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mascara. I've been using this for a couple of months, and switched over to buying this on Amazon because it was cheaper than the drug stores around me. I have naturally blonde and short eyelashes. I also have eyes that water frequently so I definitely need waterproof. I usually apply two coats of this. It stays on all day no problem. It gives my eyes just enough volume and just enough length. It doesn't clump (unless you are applying way too much), and it looks completely natural. If you're looking for huge, going out on the town, eyelashes, I probably wouldn't use this mascara. Day to day wear it is exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Smelled rancid within a week!
customer_reviews.text: You know how you can tell when makeup gets old? It stinks. I didn't notice it right away, but this mascara smells bad. I could smell it on my eyelashes after application, not just in the tube. Threw it away within a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Bluecat_22

customer_reviews.title: This has always been my favorite mascara, and I’ve tried them all!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a young 67 grandmother, and have tried just about every brand of mascara, from the expensive brands like Lancome, to the very cheap, like Elf brand. I always come back to this Cover Girl type. The main thing I like about it is the brush. It works the best for my fine eyelashes, applying smoothly and with the least amount of clumping than any other brand. And it’s still reasonably priced. You really can’t ask for any more than that!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN W CRANE

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for a while now, and I still love it. I made the mistake of trying a different kind once and remembered why I love this one so much. It doesn't glob up and looks very natural. I apply many layers, just keep brushing out my lashes until they're the length I want and never have any clumps. It may not be quite as quick, but the end result is better.
customer_reviews.author: DJV

customer_reviews.title: Good result you really have to work for
customer_reviews.text: I love the lashes I get. I love how long-lasting and smudge-poof it is and yet easy to wash off. I also wear contacts and my eyes were never irritated or full of random flakes. But, while it is free of clumps it doesn’t load a lot on the brush and it takes a lot of work to really get it on there. Much layering. Much. And the tube already feels like I need a new one after just one month and I only use it 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.text: I have used expensive mascara before and I can honestly say that this product is as good as any other mascara I have used. My lashes turn out long, thick, and since it is water resistant, it stays on all day. I hated spending a lot of money on mascara and stopping at the restroom at work mid-day to see nice raccoon circles under my eyes...so embarrassing. This product DOES NOT do that. It says on my lashes...which is where I want it. Update: Years later- still using this mascara. I used to get "infected" eyelashes- you know, when an eyelash gets really sore, and the only relief is to pull it out. I never get that with this mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. HawkinsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great volume!
customer_reviews.text: It’s good, but not entirely smudge-proof if you accidentally give your eye a good rub. It does not flake or start to make dark raccoon eyes as the day goes on. The volume control is why this is my go to mascara! The volume is amazing! I remove it easily with Dove soap or a makeup remover. Either works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Smudged a little but everything does on me. That’s just the shape of my eyes/face though, I think. Possibly the best I’ve found though. (I’ve tried many higher priced ones through sample subscriptions.) But, at the price, give it a try. I only knocked a star off due to the fact that yes it did smudge somewhat and the unnecessarily giant plastic tube. More plastic waste is not a good look.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No clumps, but may need multiple coats
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the orange Covergirl mascara for a few years, which I really like, but it can get seriously clumpy if I'm in a rush. After reading the reviews for this one, I thought I'd give it a whirl. I love it! It doesn't clump, even when I'm in a hurry to get out the door. You may need multiple coats if you like thick, dark lashes, but I actually prefer the light application because it means I can use less mascara for work, but then amp it up with a few extra coats when I go out at night.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Arrived opened!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for the first time and it arrived completely out of the package! There’s no way this could have happened during shipping if it wasn’t already tampered with. I opened the wand to see if it looked used and it definitely is. The mascara is completely dried and clumped and the wand is barely even covered.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Buildable Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Buildable mascara, never clumps. Always use multiple coats. Not fully waterproof though, but perfect for me because I have watery eyes. Other waterproof mascara aren’t daily wear because it’s difficult to get them off.
customer_reviews.author: SierraJ

customer_reviews.title: One of my new favorites!
customer_reviews.text: Currently I switch between 3 different mascaras, but right now this is my go to! No flakes, goes on flawlessly, and lasts all day! Also, it’s very easy to remove!! The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because you can’t build up off of it. Once the first coat is dry, it’s done. If you try to build up your lashes with it, it’s not going to work, or it’s gonna take a REALLY long time and a safety pin to get it right. Otherwise, excellent mascara!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I think it might be fake? The first picture with the black band is what I was sent. Super clunky, dry and gross within a day of opening it. The second picture is what it looks like when bought from Target (where I usually make the purchase). Where it is certainly not fake/ old/ or whatever the issue was with the Amazon one.
customer_reviews.author: Aschme

customer_reviews.title: Mascara was dry in the applicator
customer_reviews.text: I'm a scary came dry in the applicator. Only could use it a few times before it completely dried out. I have never had a problem with this brand before. My guess is an older lot shipped to me. The pitfalls of ordering things online, can't guarantee the "newness" of an item.
customer_reviews.author: sojournlover

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I buy this mascara all the time. I love the comb instead of the brush as it does not clump like brysh type do. However, this is the first-time I git this from Amazon instead of a beauty web site and its dry and little quality which makes me wonder if Amazon gets left over supplies. This is the fourth time I got a dated item and it was old. Moldy chocolate is not cool. It's gross but none the less, you need to be cautious with dated items. Not worth the return for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Curls but also leaves flecks on your face
customer_reviews.text: Went back to a more expensive product because after this mascara dries it it flakes badly. Lashes do stay curled, which is nice. I have to remove it after about three hours because it starts to burn my eyes. I have extremely sensitive eyes and skin. That I could wear it for three hours is actually a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. IN USA

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The formula is amazing for defining lashes and making sure there are ZERO clumps. My only complaint is that it doesn’t lengthen at all, but I am going to start using another product in combination to help with that.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara I will use. Since it's water resistant, not water proof, it withstands tears, but can be removed so much easier than water proof mascara. You don't have to rub hard or tug. The bristles aren't very long at all, so it doesn't catch too much mascara, which will only stick your lashes together, and you don't have to wipe off any access before applying. Easy to apply and build as much or as little volume as you want.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Have tried so many different types of mascara over the last 20 years. This is by far the best I have tried. Doesn't clump and makes my lashes seem much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Boys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn;t smudge underneath the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this mascara for my lower lashline... my eyelashes are long, and this water resistant version never leaves dots and smudges under my eyes... it's all i have used for years now... And after I put it on my lower lashes, I take a tissue and gently rub it just under the lash tips, which also helps prevent those pesky dots. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Forks44

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara must have sat in the warehouse too long.......two of the three tubes I ordered are very dried out. I've been using this particular mascara for some time now and I know how the consistency should be........believe me, this isn't it !! I'm very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: This goes on a little dry which means it doesn’t clump like others. It stays well, u can put more later on and it works. I usually don’t reapply bc it lasts well. High heat/humidity can make it a bit smudge-y but it’s easy to fix. I’m very pleased w this mascara!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened and then taped
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but the packing was opened and then taped shut when it arrived. It made me worried that the product had been previously used or tainted. Trashy package presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy another kind
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara for me hands down. Absolutely zero clumping. Long lasting. Hell I’ve cried and it holds up decently well which is great considering it’s not water proof. I use garnier micellar water on a cotton pad to remove. I have VERY sensitive eyes/skin and this is the only kind that doesn’t burn for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Was on sale at the time so was offered for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t my favorite mascara by far, however, it was on sale here at the time I purchased it and thought I would try it. For the price I got it for, it was definitely worth what I paid for it gets the job done and I don’t have a particular complaint about it, it’s just not up at the top with my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D.

customer_reviews.title: Best "Cheap" Mascara
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cheapie mascara. I never get clumps, and it goes on super smooth. My lashed get tangled really easily with a lot of mascaras, but this brush really keeps all my lashed separate. It also gives my lashes a great curl without using an eyelash curler.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Derbyshire

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It doesn't clump - I know many reviewers say theirs was dry when they first opened it and that it clumped the first time they applied it. That wasn't the case for me. I wonder if there is a great variance in how long these mascaras sit in the warehouse (or wherever) before they reach consumers. Mine wasn't dry at all, and I can apply it very easily. It doesn't smudge all day (I haven't tried swimming with it), a bit hard to remove even with eye make up remover but it's still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Akiko Morgan

customer_reviews.title: No clump mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is definitely clump free, but because of that don’t expect it to make your lashes look long and full of volume. It gives more of a natural look. I have to apply at least 4 coats for lashes to look more visible. And the curling shape brush doesn’t really curl the lashes. Good for every day look but not for going out.
customer_reviews.author: Irene D.

customer_reviews.title: doesn't feel like the same formula
customer_reviews.text: I really love the original clump crusher. This version doesn't seem like the same. It feels too thick, like it's already almost gone even though it's a new package. Doesn't go on as smoothly. Next time I'll try to find the original version.
customer_reviews.author: Rolen K. West

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my least favorite mascara I've ever bought. So little of the mascara went on the brush that it was like you didn't put any on. I understand wanting lightweight mascara that doesn't clump, but this was like invisible mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Ironically named mascara
customer_reviews.text: Wand is covered with clumps straight out of the container. I’ve tried cleaning the wand entirely but each time I dip it into the mascara tube new clumps appear. Worse the bristles on the wind are so smaller than the clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lee Redden

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mascara for the price. It separates the lashes and gives length and volume without leaving clumps. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things about this mascara but was overall very disappointed. It doesn't go on very well, you can barely tell you're wearing any mascara at all. Adding another coat just makes it look clumpy and gross. It doesn't thicken or lengthen the lashes at all. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Too dry!
customer_reviews.text: It was very dry. I had to add eye drops to it to even make it work, but had to go to the store and buy a different tube. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara but buy in store not from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Mascara is great but I feel uneasy. I got this mascara today and the packaging was completely open. I looked at the mascara and it seems fine...but it's not exactly like I stuck it under a microscope. Praying to every god I don't believe in that I don't get pink eye. Amazon quality is really slipping in my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best drug store brand mascara I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to mascara ever since it first came out. I used to use lash blast but found that this goes on easier and can hold up to two coats without turning into spider legs. I definitely recommend brown if you have blue eyes and fair skin. It looks more natural than black and makes blue eyes pop more. The price here as an add-on item is better than the price at Walmart, Target, etc., and if there's a coupon on amazon it makes it the lowest price I've ever seen for it anywhere. If you're used to $30+ mascara, this probably won't impress you, but for the price it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this mascara but soon after opening it seemed already old and kinda empty. Also thought it was going to be waterproof. I’m hoping the seller might contact me bc the quality of this mascara isn’t what I’m usually use to.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee p.

customer_reviews.title: Never clumps
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I’ve ever had. This is actually my second one from Covergirl because my first one was dark brown. They have never clumped like the other brand I had, and they make my eyelashes look perfect! Truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Clesh

customer_reviews.title: So frusterated!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mascara since it's my favorite, but I got two makeups instead-- not the two mascaras. So frustruating. Now I have to figure out how to send this back and no one is answering the phone due to COVID 19 :(
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I used the orange tube for a long time, but once I tried this it stuck. I have blonde eyelashes and so I usually have to put on a lot which usually clumps. The brush really keeps the lashes from clumping together and that makes it so much better for me. I usually do 2 light coats
customer_reviews.author: MandyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This does not live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I was hoping this would make my lashes look fuller and longer and instead it barely looked like I had any mascara on at all. I was so disappointed in this product. There are so many better ones out there. I even had to use a different kind of mascara over the top of this to get any kind of volume. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stockslader

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The mascara is not a very dramatic effect, but wears well throughout the day. The eye liner is simple to apply and sharpen and stays on ok (not great). For the price I paid (around $8 total), it is a really good value pack considering both items alone would have been around $14.
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: My main choise
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mascara for a long time now. The main reason is the brush - it's not huge or tiny and it doesn't have goopy mascara on it. Plus, the curve really makes a difference in perfect coating. It just works for me, so I will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mascara!!! Tried it as soon as it arrived and cannot be happier!! I have super short lashes and cannot stand the false ones for too long, so this works great for me!! Not overly dramatic, but not too subtle either!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your makeup kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! It’s great on its own as an everyday natural look that builds easily for a little more oomph. I like to use it with a volumizing mascara- I use this first to separate and prime my lashes, then whatever else, and back to this to separate and spread.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant?!?
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem to be water resistant at all, for some reason makes my eyes water and then it’s just a big blob under my eyes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kozlowski

customer_reviews.title: So long Maybelline
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara, does not burn my sensitive eyes, does not smudge, does not ClUMP, never had a mascara that did not, so now I have 6 of these and have thrown all of my others away, at least 4, anyway that is why the 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Seemed dried up.didnt really do much. I'm going to keep on trying it. Maybe it was just the one tube.
customer_reviews.author: Uberstylist

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product came with nothing inside it was dry first time ivw ever received one like that I've used them for years it littered dry the package was open I wont return I'm throw it away do I reccomend this yes I do. I just got one that's dried out
customer_reviews.author: Candle 🕯Light💡

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it goes on my lashes but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it goes on my lashes but the applicator is very plasticy and with in hrs it is flaking and all over my face. So if you will be out more then 2 hrs use a differnt kind.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Mascara!!
customer_reviews.text: I seem to really like it. It's a nice dark black. Makes your eye lashes look fuller and more spread out. I think it's a great mascara. I am picking with mascara. And know it doesn't irritate it or bother it and have no problem with it. It's a great one to check out if interested.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Great price 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I have always loved the eyeliner that you just twist it so you don't have to sharpen it. Less mess!
customer_reviews.author: Alliekat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and took a leap of faith.... nope. Should've went to the store. It feels like it's almost out of product, is dry, and not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have thick and long eyelashes. This mascara doesn’t even stick! It’s like I’m applying air to my lashes
customer_reviews.author: N E V A

customer_reviews.title: Dry, Poor formula
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would be just as good as the other cover girl mascara but highly disappointed! Not sure if I got a bad tube or this mascara just truly sucks.... my eyelashes almost look like there is nothing on them, the wand looks bare when it comes out of the tube before applying and no matter how many times I push it in and out hoping to have more product on the wand, nothing!!! It’s almost like it’s dried out or a bad formula! Either way- waste of money for me!
customer_reviews.author: chase

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Had seen reviews for the best mascara and Covergirl had two, Clump Crusher Water Resistant Lashblast and Lash Blast. Both are good. Costs less than a lot of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t clump but takes forever to see on your lashes
customer_reviews.text: Writing from my husband’s account. It definitely doesn’t clump which is nice, but it takes literally 10 years to get any product on your lashes. I have two kids, I don’t have time to put on 15 layers of mascara. If you like a very natural look, this is for you. If you like LASHES, don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Irritating chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and brush looked great but I didn’t try it. The mascara gave off a strong chemical smell. I asked a couple of friends to smell it and they all agreed it was awful. I think the smell alone would be irritating if I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this mascara. Very quickly applied, stays on without flaking, and then it washes off with soap and water. The only reason it gets 4 stars is because it used to be packaged with the brush separately. Talk about fresh product! It was fabulous. Still great with the brush inside, but not as great.
customer_reviews.author: mbindiana

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product, and it arrived completely dried out. Instead of a refund, I excepted a replacement mascara. That has arrived, and it, too, is completely dry. I have thrown them in the trash and I I’ve wasted seven dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hauptman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite mascara. I have lashes that clump and tangle together. They look their best with this mascara. You can always add more coats if you want more drama.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nester

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. It goes on smoothly with no clumps and washes off easily. I haven’t had a problem with smudging even when I’m teary with allergies or sweating during workouts.
customer_reviews.author: lyds

customer_reviews.title: Great lash extender and no clumps!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had great experience with mascaras - even after spending $30-40 at Sephora. They all claim not to be clumpy, but somehow you always get clumps. This is the best mascara I have used for making lashes look longer, but without clumps. You may get one now and then, but most likely not. It is very easy to apply and the brush comes out super clean each time. The bottle is tight such that the brush doesn't get clumps on the way out! No longer need to use an eyelash brush to clear clumps! Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: M CALDERA

customer_reviews.title: If you hate those thicc bristles, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these mascara wands! Gets all my lashes separated and if I wait 20 seconds in between, I can apply a thicker out and they look even BETTER! Recc 2 coats for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Set2020

customer_reviews.title: Big Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way it goes on...There's no clumps or any problems what-so-ever! It's super stuff....It doesn't flake onto my cheeks it's a winner in my book. The only mascara I like as much as this kind is from another company and it's just as good as this one. I deem them great if they go on smoothly, have no clumps, and stay on well with no flakes falling over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascare, eyelashes do not clump.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried hundreds of mascaras and this one actually goes on great and looks fabulous without clumping my eyelashes together. Easy to remove and apply.
customer_reviews.author: Chessa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best mascara
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I needed a waterproof mascara. I've used better in the past. It doesn't go on smoothly. The positives are that it didn't flake or smudge.
customer_reviews.author: djrob

customer_reviews.title: This is my go-to mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I love how it covers and separates my lashes. The formula is not too thick but buildable and lengthening. The curved, short-bristled brush does a great job to coat lashes and the formula is buildable
customer_reviews.author: M. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works, kinda dry.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying makeup on here. I thought this purchase would be ok because I've used this one before but I think the one I received had probably been sitting around awhile....It's pretty dry. I have to dip the wand at least 3-4 times just to try to get one lash. It kinda sucks and I was pretty disappointed. I can't even tell the difference between this new one and my old one that was over 6months old and running out.
customer_reviews.author: Reichel Cook

customer_reviews.title: 20x means you need to apply 20 times
customer_reviews.text: Now I understand what 20x means, you need to apply 20 times to get even a glimpse of your eyelashes. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Clump Crusher Extensions LashBlast Mascara, 0.44 Fl Oz (Pack of 1), Very Black Color, For Longer & Fuller Looking Lashes, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Color:Very Black| Size:Pack of 1| Style:ExtensionsGive your lashes 200% more volume and 50% more length without the clumps compared to bare lashes when you use COVERGIRL Clump Crusher Extensions Volumizing Mascara by LashBlast. Create any look from natural to dramatic with buildable volume + length. Its innovative curved brush with a fiber stretch formula sweeps away clumps and separates your lashes for a truly flawless look. (Packaging may vary)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Love the look of lash extensions but can’t be bothered with the messy, costly upkeep? Introducing new Clump Crusher Extensions Mascara. Our fabulous fiber-stretch formula gives you buildable volume and length instantly. The curved brush reduces clumping and its precision-bristle spacing coats each and every lash for long, separated lashes.

 * 200% more volume + length, zero clumps
 * Fiber-stretch formula for buildable volume and length
 * Precision bristle spacing reduces clumps

PRO SECRETS
The makeup artist tips that will keep your lashes looking lush.

 * Never, ever pump the wand – this adds air to the mascara container, which will only make your mascara dry out faster.
 * Use less mascara on lower lashes than on top lashes. Or skip the mascara on lower lashes for a more casual look.
 * After you've coated lashes with mascara, add just one more layer to the outer corners. The extra coat will make your lashes look especially long and make your eyes appear farther apart.
 * Dermatologists recommend replacing your mascara four to six months after opening a tube. Sealed tubes last up to two years, so don't be afraid to stock up!

COMPLETE THE LOOK
CLEAN WHIPPED CRÈME FOUNDATION
Lightweight, air-whipped formula 
instantly hydrates

CLEAN GLOW BLUSH
Lightweight, blendable flush of color

LIPSLICKS SMOOCHIES LIP BALM
Sheer color and a hint of shine

BLAST BASICS
Find the Blast mascara that fits you best.

Clump Crusher Extensions 
(This Product) Clump Crusher by LashBlast 
(Available in Waterproof) LashBlast 24 HR LashBlast Volume 
(Available in Waterproof) LashBlast Fusion 
(Available in Water Resistant) LashBlast Luxe LashBlast Length 
(Available in Water Resistant) Volume Length Waterproof Lasts up to 24 Hours Curved Brush
feature_bullets: SHOWSTOPPING VOLUME: A breakthrough mascara that amps up your eyelashes with 20x more volume
SAY GOODBYE TO CLUMPING: An innovative clump proof mascara formula
THE BEST TOOL FOR THE BEST YOU: Features a clump crushing, double-sided brush with lash-loading and clump-combing zones
CRUELTY-FREE: Covergirl products are Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International, meaning they’re never tested on animals
